attributes.action: deal with the problem of cormorants predating inland british waterways, destroying fish stocks in natural and man made waters.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Cormorants are currently a protected species, these natural seabirds are predating inland waters all over the country, in the Prime ministers constituency some 90+ birds have been counted on one natural water! We would like to see the Prime minister take some time to look at this problem and produce a solution. DEFRA currently issue licences to shoot certain numbers of these birds, some waters which are visited by upto 16 birds per day were given licences to shoot 4 birds per year. We would welcome a solution to a problem that costs fishery owners and fishing clubs millions of pounds a year.
